verses.text: \w Of|strong="H6440"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* pretended \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* insane \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Abimelech, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* \w drove|strong="H1644"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*. \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* bless \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w*; \w His|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w will|strong="H6440"\w* always \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* lips.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul boasts \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oppressed hear \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice.

Magnify \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H8085"\w* exalt \w His|strong="H3068"\w* name \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w me|strong="H7311"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fears.

\w Those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* radiant \w with|strong="H3068"\w* joy; \w their|strong="H3605"\w* faces \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* never \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed.

\w This|strong="H6440"\w* poor \w man|strong="H6440"\w* called \w out|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w He|strong="H6440"\w* saved \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* angel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* encamps around \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w Him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivers|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

Taste \w and|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good; blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w who|strong="H3068"\w* takes refuge \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w Him|strong="H5439"\w*!

Fear \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* saints, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w Him|strong="H7200"\w* lack nothing.

Young lions \w go|strong="H3068"\w* lacking \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hungry, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lack|strong="H4270"\w* \w no|strong="H3372"\w* good \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

Come, children, \w listen|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* delights \w in|strong="H3068"\w* life, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* desires \w to|strong="H3212"\w* see good days?
\w Keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* tongue \w from|strong="H3117"\w* evil \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w from|strong="H3117"\w* deceitful speech.

Turn \w away|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H8193"\w* good; seek peace \w and|strong="H1696"\w* pursue \w it|strong="H5341"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* righteous, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w His|strong="H5493"\w* ears \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w inclined|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* cry.

\w But|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* evil, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wipe out \w all|strong="H3068"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* righteous cry \w out|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* hears; \w He|strong="H6213"\w* delivers \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubles|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* brokenhearted; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w saves|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* contrite \w in|strong="H3068"\w* spirit.

Many \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflictions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* righteous, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivers|strong="H3467"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7665"\w* \w all|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* protects \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bones; \w not|strong="H7451"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* broken.

Evil \w will|strong="H3808"\w* slay \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked, \w and|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* condemned.

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* redeems \w His|strong="H8130"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* none \w who|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Him|strong="H4191"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w condemned|strong="H7563"\w*.
